meanings.definition: Brainiacs (noun): extremely intelligent or clever people
meanings.sent1: The brainiacs in our class always get the highest grades.
meanings.sent2: She joined the team of brainiacs to work on the challenging project.
meanings.sent3: The brainiacs came up with a genius plan to win the science fair.
meanings.sent4: His brainiacs were like a team of superheroes, solving problems effortlessly.
meanings.sent5: The image of the brainiacs huddled around the puzzle will forever be etched in my mind.

meanings.definition: Brainiacs (adjective): relating to or characteristic of extremely intelligent or clever people
meanings.sent1: We were amazed by her brainiacs ability to solve complex equations.
meanings.sent2: The brainiacs group discussion was filled with insightful ideas.
meanings.sent3: His brainiacs sense of humor always lightens the mood in the room.
meanings.sent4: The book described the character as having brainiacs qualities that set him apart.
meanings.sent5: Her brainiacs approach to problem-solving was both impressive and effective.
